name: julia

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description: The Julia Language: A fresh approach to technical computing

dependencies.name: gmake
dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.

dependencies.name: llvm
dependencies.description:
The LLVM Project is a collection of modular and reusable compiler and
toolchain technologies. Despite its name, LLVM has little to do with
traditional virtual machines, though it does provide helpful libraries
that can be used to build them. The name "LLVM" itself is not an
acronym; it is the full name of the project.

dependencies.name: libuv
dependencies.description: Multi-platform library with a focus on asynchronous IO

dependencies.name: libuv-julia
dependencies.description: Multi-platform library with a focus on asynchronous IO

dependencies.name: libblastrampoline
dependencies.description: Using PLT trampolines to provide a BLAS and LAPACK demuxing library.

dependencies.name: libgit2
dependencies.description:
libgit2 is a portable, pure C implementation of the Git core methods
provided as a re-entrant linkable library with a solid API, allowing you
to write native speed custom Git applications in any language which
supports C bindings.

dependencies.name: libssh2
dependencies.description: libssh2 is a client-side C library implementing the SSH2 protocol

dependencies.name: mbedtls
dependencies.description:
mbed TLS (formerly known as PolarSSL) makes it trivially easy for
developers to include cryptographic and SSL/TLS capabilities in their
(embedded) products, facilitating this functionality with a minimal
coding footprint.

dependencies.name: openlibm
dependencies.description:
OpenLibm is an effort to have a high quality, portable, standalone C
mathematical library

dependencies.name: nghttp2
dependencies.description:
nghttp2 is an implementation of HTTP/2 and its header compression
algorithm HPACK in C.

dependencies.name: curl
dependencies.description:
cURL is an open source command line tool and library for transferring
data with URL syntax

dependencies.name: patchelf
dependencies.description:
PatchELF is a small utility to modify the dynamic linker and RPATH of
ELF executables.

dependencies.name: perl
dependencies.description:
Perl 5 is a highly capable, feature-rich programming language with over
27 years of development.

dependencies.name: libwhich
dependencies.description: Libwhich: the functionality of which for libraries.

dependencies.name: python
dependencies.description: The Python programming language.

dependencies.name: blas
dependencies.description: A BLAS and LAPACK wrapper library with runtime exchangable backends

dependencies.name: dsfmt
dependencies.description: Double precision SIMD-oriented Fast Mersenne Twister

dependencies.name: gmp
dependencies.description:
GMP is a free library for arbitrary precision arithmetic, operating on
signed integers, rational numbers, and floating-point numbers.

dependencies.name: lapack
dependencies.description: A BLAS and LAPACK wrapper library with runtime exchangable backends

dependencies.name: mpfr
dependencies.description:
The MPFR library is a C library for multiple-precision floating-point
computations with correct rounding.

dependencies.name: openblas
dependencies.description: OpenBLAS: An optimized BLAS library

dependencies.name: p7zip
dependencies.description: A Unix port of the 7z file archiver

dependencies.name: pcre2
dependencies.description:
The PCRE2 package contains Perl Compatible Regular Expression libraries.
These are useful for implementing regular expression pattern matching
using the same syntax and semantics as Perl 5.

dependencies.name: suite-sparse
dependencies.description: SuiteSparse is a suite of sparse matrix algorithms

dependencies.name: unwind
dependencies.description:
A portable and efficient C programming interface (API) to determine the
call-chain of a program.

dependencies.name: utf8proc
dependencies.description:
A clean C library for processing UTF-8 Unicode data: normalization,
case-folding, graphemes, and more

dependencies.name: zlib-api
dependencies.description:
A free, general-purpose, legally unencumbered lossless data-compression
library.

dependencies.name: zlib
dependencies.description:
A free, general-purpose, legally unencumbered lossless data-compression
library.

dependent_to.name: libcxxwrap-julia
dependent_to.description:
This is the C++ library component of the CxxWrap.jl package, distributed
as a regular CMake library for use in other C++ projects.

dependent_to.name: simulationio
dependent_to.description: SimulationIO: Efficient and convenient I/O for large PDE simulations

dependent_to.name: mlpack
dependent_to.description:
mlpack is an intuitive, fast, and flexible header-only C++ machine
learning library with bindings to other languages. It is meant to be a
machine learning analog to LAPACK, and aims to implement a wide array of
machine learning methods and functions as a "swiss army knife" for
machine learning researchers.
